content:
Can someone please let me know a roadmap to be FHIR-based eCQM developer? Many thanks for your help.

Regards,
Tien Thai
I don't think there's a formal roadmap. @Bryn Rhodes may have some recommendations though...

We are working on some FHIR-based quality reporting educational sessions, stay tuned to the eCQI Resource Center for those events as they come up. We have also incorporated FHIR into the Cooking with CQL sessions.
If you have specific questions or examples you'd like to see worked through, we are always looking for Cooking with CQL examples.
